mapper.select: SELECT fanyong_income, share_income, got_total_rent, other_income, withdrawed FROM czb_user_income_info WHERE user_id = #{userId}

SELECT cp.car_license AS carLicense, cp.identify_code AS identifyCode, c.startTime AS startTime, c.endTime AS endTime, c.State AS status, c.num AS contractId, c.rent AS rentMoney FROM czb_cars_persons cp, ( SELECT record_id num, date_format(contract_start_time, '%Y.%m.%d') startTime, date_format(contract_end_time, '%Y.%m.%d') endTime, contract_state State, rent FROM czb_contract_records cc WHERE cc.user_id = #{userId} ) AS c WHERE cp.contract_record_id = #{contractId} and c.num = #{contractId}

SELECT cp.car_license AS carLicense, c.endTime AS endTime, c.State AS status, c.num AS contractId FROM czb_cars_persons cp, ( SELECT record_id num, date_format(contract_start_time, '%Y.%m.%d') startTime, date_format(contract_end_time, '%Y.%m.%d') endTime, contract_state State, rent FROM czb_contract_records cc WHERE cc.user_id = #{userId} ) AS c WHERE cp.contract_record_id = c.num

SELECT ccr.record_id contractId, count(ccr2.record_id) carNum, count(ccp.person_car_id) isSignNum, date_format( ccr.contract_start_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) startTime, date_format( ccr.contract_end_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) endTime, ccr.contract_state status FROM czb_contract_records ccr LEFT JOIN czb_contract_records ccr2 ON ccr2.contract_father_id = ccr.record_id LEFT JOIN czb_cars_persons ccp ON ccr2.record_id = ccp.contract_record_id AND ccp.is_signed = 1 WHERE ccr.user_id = "155754952686931" AND ccr.contract_type = 0 GROUP BY contractId, startTime, endTime, status

SELECT c.record_id contractId, c.contract_state STATUS, date_format( c.contract_start_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) startTime, date_format( c.contract_end_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) endTime FROM czb_contract_records c WHERE user_id = #{userId}

SELECT p.isSignNum signedCarNum, c.carNum FROM ( SELECT count(cc.person_car_Id) AS carNum FROM czb_cars_persons cc WHERE cc.contract_record_id IN ( SELECT ccc.record_id cid FROM czb_contract_records ccc WHERE ccc.contract_father_id = #{fatherId} ) ) c, ( SELECT count(pp.person_car_Id) AS isSignNum FROM czb_cars_persons pp WHERE pp.contract_record_id IN ( SELECT ccc.record_id cid FROM czb_contract_records ccc WHERE ccc.contract_father_id = #{fatherId} ) AND pp.is_signed = 1 ) p
SELECT (plan_amount * 12) AS taoText FROM czb_service_plan WHERE plan_id = #{planId}

SELECT p.person_name AS personName, p.car_license AS license, p.person_id_card AS carId, p.is_signed AS isSign, p.plan_id as rent FROM czb_contract_records c, czb_cars_persons p WHERE c.record_id = p.contract_record_id and p.contract_record_id IN ( SELECT record_id FROM czb_contract_records p1 WHERE contract_father_id = #{fatherId} ) GROUP BY person_name, license, carId, is_signed, plan_id
